fields.name: Tag Format
fields.description: This is always "OT", this helps differentiate between the OpenTag3D and other formats.

fields.name: Tag Version
fields.description: RFID tag data format version, with 3 implied decimal points. Eg `1000` → version `1.000`.

fields.name: Filament Manufacturer
fields.description: Name of filament manufacturer. Long names should be abbreviated or truncated.

fields.name: Base Material Name
fields.description: Material name in plain text, excluding any modifiers.

fields.name: Material Modifiers
fields.description: Material subcategory or modifier in plain text. Long modifiers may need to be abbreviated.

fields.name: Color Name
fields.description: Color in plain text.

fields.name: Color Hex
fields.description: Color stored as 4 separate 1-byte integers for red, green, blue and alpha, in the sRGB color space.

fields.name: Target Diameter
fields.description: Filament diameter (target) in µm (micrometers). Eg `1750` → `1.750mm`.

fields.name: Target Weight
fields.description: Filament weight in grams, excluding spool weight. This is the TARGET weight (e.g., 1kg). Actual measured weight is stored in a different field.

fields.name: Print Temperature
fields.description: Recommended print temperature in degrees Celsius, divided by 5. For example, `42` = `210°C`.

fields.name: Bed Temperature
fields.description: Recommended bed temperature in degrees Celsius, divided by 5. For example, `12` = `60°C`.

fields.name: Density
fields.description: Filament density in µg (micrograms) per cubic centimeter. Eg `1240` → `1.240g/cm³`.

fields.name: RESERVED
fields.description: Reserved for future use. This goes up to the memory limit of NTAG213.

fields.name: Online Data URL
fields.description: URL to access online JSON additional parameters. Formatted without `https` to save space.

fields.name: Serial Number / Batch ID
fields.description: Manufacturer's identifier for a spool batch or serial number.

fields.name: Manufacture Date
fields.description: Stored as 2 bytes for year, then 1 byte for month and 1 byte for day.

fields.name: Manufacture Time
fields.description: Stored as 1 byte each for hour, minute, and second in 24-hour UTC.

fields.name: Spool Core Diameter
fields.description: Core diameter in mm (millimeters).

fields.name: MFI Temp
fields.description: MFI test temperature, divided by 5. For example, `42` = `210ºC`.

fields.name: MFI Load
fields.description: MFI test load grams, divided by 10. For example, `216` = `2.16kg`.

fields.name: MFI Value
fields.description: MFI value, divided by 10.

fields.name: Measured Tolerance
fields.description: Measured tolerance in µm (micrometers).

fields.name: Empty Spool Weight
fields.description: Weight of empty spool in grams.

fields.name: Measured Filament Weight
fields.description: Weight of filament only.

fields.name: Measured Filament Length
fields.description: Length in meters.

fields.name: Transmission Distance (TD)
fields.description: Opaque thickness in µm (micrometers).

fields.name: Max Dry Temp
fields.description: Max safe drying temp, divided by 5.

fields.name: Dry Time
fields.description: Recommended drying time.

fields.name: Min Print Temp
fields.description: Minimum nozzle temp, divided by 5. For example, `38` = `190ºC`.

fields.name: Max Print Temp
fields.description: Maximum nozzle temp, divided by 5.

fields.name: Min Volumetric Speed
fields.description: Min speed recommendation.

fields.name: Max Volumetric Speed
fields.description: Max safe speed.

fields.name: Target Volumetric Speed
fields.description: Default recommended speed.

fields.name: RESERVED
fields.description: Reserved for future use.
